prompt:
Image Prompt:
"Create a striking and symbolic representation of the biblical concept of the 'wrath of God.' Depict a powerful storm brewing in the skies above a vast landscape, with dark clouds swirling ominously and bolts of lightning cracking through the heavens. Show a scene where nature itself seems to tremble before the divine fury, conveying a sense of awe-inspiring majesty and the overwhelming might of a wrathful deity. Incorporate subtle religious imagery such as a distant mountain resembling Mount Sinai or an ancient temple shrouded in shadows, hinting at the divine origins of this cataclysmic display."
